moduleName: GitHub / Users / Authenticated / List Public Emails
description:
Lists your publicly visible email address, which you can set with the
[Set primary email visibility for the authenticated user](https://docs.github.com/rest/users/emails#set-primary-email-visibility-for-the-authenticated-user)
endpoint.

OAuth app tokens and personal access tokens (classic) need the `user:email` scope to use this endpoint.

schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100). For more information, see "[Using pagination in the REST API](https://docs.github.com/rest/using-the-rest-api/using-pagination-in-the-rest-api)."
The page number of the results to fetch. For more information, see "[Using pagination in the REST API](https://docs.github.com/rest/using-the-rest-api/using-pagination-in-the-rest-api)."
